title: The Last Dance
description: In this Dateline classic, a mother of two vanishes from her home, leading investigators to uncover a disturbing connection between her recent weight loss and her mysterious disappearance. Andrea Canning reports. Originally aired on NBC on April 3, 2015.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
